`{
          "service_instance_type" : "HDFS",
          "mpack_instance_name" : "HDPCORE",
          "level" : "WARN",
          "mpack_instance_type" : "HDPCORE",
          "type" : "configuration",
          "message" : "Empty value for hadoop.proxyuser.root.hosts",
          "component_instance_type" : "null",
          "config-type" : "core-site",
          "mpack_version" : "1.0.0-b366",
          "config-name" : "hadoop.proxyuser.root.hosts",
          "host" : "",
          "component_instance_name" : "null",
          "service_instance_name" : "HDFS"
        }`

some properties are named with dash (mpack_version) some with underscore (config-name). Can we make it consistent?

I also want to apply the same patch for the branch release-2.6.1 and release-2.6.2 should I create a separate jira issue and give the pull request or can I use the same #1323  thread ?
@adoroszlai @mpapirkovskyy @zeroflag @rlevas please review my changes; thanks in advance!

Refer to this link for build results (access rights to CI server needed): 
https://builds.apache.org/job/Ambari-Github-PullRequest-Builder/2500/
Test PASSed.

@nareshgbhat You don't need a seperate Jira issue, but a new pull request is required, since pull requests are specific to a target branch.  Also, `release-2.6.1` and `release-2.6.2` are tags -- you can apply similar change to `branch-2.6` instead.

Also, a number of unit tests seem to be broken by this change (in addition to `MpackTest`):

```
Tests run: 4787, Failures: 31, Errors: 217, Skipped: 91
->
Tests run: 4787, Failures: 32, Errors: 235, Skipped: 91
```
@g-boros

@aonishuk 

Your change made the builds in Ambari-Github-PullRequest-Builder fail (even your change has been failed but you did not wait for the Jenkins job).
Could you please fix the issue in `org.apache.ambari.server.controller.internal.BlueprintConfigurationProcessorTest.testZookeeperConfigExported()`:
```
1915680 [ERROR] Failures: 
1915680 [ERROR]   BlueprintConfigurationProcessorTest.testZookeeperConfigExported:1972 slider-client zookeeper config not properly exported expected:<[%HOSTGROUP::host_group_1%:2112,%HOSTGROUP::host_group_2%]:1221> but was:<[c6401.apache.ambari.org:2112,c6402.ambari.apache.org]:1221>
```

Thanks @smolnar82 
Already doing it
Thx
retest this please
